category-def.name: org.openscada.jinterop.category
category-def.label: openSCADA j-Interop
category-def.description: Contains the library j-Interop and its dependencies. This is the openSCADA built version. The original version can be found at http://j-interop.org/

category-def.name: org.openscada.jinterop.sdk.category
category-def.label: openSCADA j-Interop (SDK)
category-def.description: Contains the source and binary features for openSCADA j-Interop.
